input.sentences: the chef preps the meat for the guest .
first | he cuts up the meat .
he then garnishes it with spice .
he ties up the meat into a sausage shape .
the food is then cooked with potatoes .
output.sentences: Today, I bought a huge hunk of cow meat.
I want to make a delicious meal, so I begin to carefully slice the meat with a knife.
I cover the meat with a large dose of thyme.
Then I take string and wrap it around the piece of meat.
Finally, mouth watering, I boil the meat in a pot of water and cut up apples.
